title: Did you meet Lindsey Graham, a proud babysitter before the Capitol attack?
subtitle: Following the January 6 attack on the Capitol, social media users highlighted a picture of Graham with Joe Biggs, who was said to have helped plan the activities of the right-wing group on the day of the riots.
author: Dan MacGuill
vclaim: U.S. Lindsay Graham had dinner with Joe Biggs, a prominent figure in the right-wing proud boys group before he helped Biggs plan a January 2021 attack on the American Capitol.
